statements: DELETE FROM training_history WHERE model_id = 1 AND training_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_history WHERE training_accuracy < 90 AND (training_loss > 0.5 OR validation_loss > 0.5);
DELETE FROM training_history WHERE id = 100 AND epoch_count > 5;
DELETE FROM model_progress WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM training_history WHERE epoch = 10 AND model_id = 1;
DELETE FROM model_progress WHERE training_accuracy < 0.8 OR validation_accuracy < 0.75 AND model_id = 2;
DELETE FROM model_progress WHERE epoch < 5 AND optimizer = 'adam';
DELETE FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
